sentences.en: All types of vagotomy cause an increase of basal and postprandial serum gastrin levels.
sentences.cn: 所有类型的迷走神经切断术,均产生空腹和餐后血清促胃液素水平的升高.

sentences.en: Both fasting and postprandial ET were positively correlated ( P & lt ; 0.01 ) with BG.
sentences.cn: 空腹、餐后内皮素与血糖正相关 ( P < 0.01 ).

sentences.en: He complained almost ceaselessly of postprandial nausea.
sentences.cn: 他差不多不断地诉说饭后呕吐.

sentences.en: His postprandial nap was disturbed by the arrival of the boss.
sentences.cn: 老板一到,惊扰了他餐后假寐.

trans.tran_en: happening immediately after a meal – often used humorously
